document_data.name: Huge Spider
document_data.mainbody: '''Huge spiders''' were a common variety of monstrous [[spider]]s in the Realms.
document_data.Description: These arachnids were typically bigger than mundane or [[large spider]]s, but smaller in size compared to [[giant spider]]s.
document_data.Behavior: Like any arachnid, huge spiders were aggressive creatures.
document_data.Abilities: Unlike other arachnids, huge spiders did not spin webs. They could leap up to {{SI|30|ft}} into the air and delivered [[poison]] to victims through their fangs.
document_data.Combat: Some species of huge spider roved around in search of prey, such as the giant wolf spider. Other species, such as the trapdoor spider, would carefully construct camouflaged tunnels and holes to hide in until prey passed by.
document_data.History:
During [[Halaster's Higharvestide]], huge spiders were occasionally encountered in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].

Around [[1368 DR]], [[Phylund|House Phylund]] was experimenting with a variety of huge spider species.<ref>

Species.Deathjump spider: A species of huge spider that could leap great distances and often waited to ambush its prey.<ref group="note" name="Designation">Though not stated to be a "huge spider" in its [[Monster Manual 4th edition|''Monster Manual'']] entry, both the size and traits of this species match up with the defining traits of "huge spiders."
Species.Giant wolf spider: a species of huge spider similar to the mundane wolf spider. Though they typically hunted across open ground, they also were known to hide in burrows, crevices, or hidden cavities beneath debris.
Species.'''Huge tarantula''': a huge variety of the mundane [[tarantula]]. Their bites imparted a paralytic poison. Some were known to be found in the [[Raurin]] desert.
Species.'''Trapdoor spider''': A huge variety of the mundane trapdoor spider. Some were known to be found in the Raurin desert.
Species.Watchspider: a species of huge spider that were specially bred to act as guard animals.

Ecology.Habitats:
Huge spiders could potentially inhabit almost any region, except for those with cold climates.

In [[North Faer√ªn]] they could be found throughout the regions of [[Daggerdale]], [[Shadowdale]], [[Zhentil Keep]], and the fertile areas of the [[Plain of Standing Stones]]. In [[the North]] they could be found in parts of [[Cormanthor]]'s forests and the [[Rat Hills]].

In the [[Hordelands]] they were quite common in the [[Ama Basin]] and [[Hagga Shan]]. Elsewhere in the region of [[Kara-tur]], they could be found in the forests of [[Akari|Akari island]]. In the land of [[Maztica]] they could be found in many hills and mountains. In the [[Zakhara]] region's [[Crowded Sea]], they could be found on the island chain of [[Nada al-Hazan]].
Ecology.Relationships:
Huge spiders were often found in the company of [[drider]]s. The [[Tanor'Thal]] family of [[drow]] kept many within their residence at [[Skullport]].

Some creatures in the [[Underdark]] used them in groups to transport goods as a caravan.
